glosses: Gaziköy (a neighbourhood in Kozan district, Adana Province, Turkey)
Gaziköy (a village in Sarkışla district, Sivas Province, Turkey)
Gaziköy (a village in Sivas district, Sivas Province, Turkey)
Gaziköy (a neighbourhood in Siverek district, Şanlıurfa Province, Turkey)
Gaziköy (a neighbourhood in Şarköy district, Tekirdağ Province, Turkey)

etymology: By surface analysis, gazi (“war veteran”) + köy (“village”).
